-e ---

𓌼 see measure
𓍅 ≈ 𓍆 meter metric math
𓌷 𓂝 𓏏 𓏮 𓆄 𓆄 | (dual) judgement | maat > measure
𓅐 𓏏 𓊌 | weight | meter ⲙⲉⲧⲣⲏ measure Maß

𒉘 aĝ2 #madādu "to meter, to measure"

𓄟 𒈨𒃻𒊑 me-šá-ri mešári mosari •measure "justice" ⇔ ⲙⲉⲉ Moses commandments

𒌑 kūš ≈ 𒋢 kuš
𒌑 kūš 𒆪𒍑 ku-uš "cubit" 𒌑𒈬𒌋 ú-mu-u 𒄠𒈠𒌅 am-ma-tú ⇔ Meter Maß
